intro: Lucy always thought her cat Momo was special… but she never imagined he could talk!
description:
A magical visual novel where cats have much more than meows to say!

What if your cat could talk... and was part of a secret civilization?
Lucy thought Momo was just her adorable furry companion, but one night she discovers everything! Together they will travel across moonlit rooftops, mysterious tunnels, and forgotten ruins, uncovering secrets that have been hidden for centuries.

Get ready for a story full of magic, friendship, and mystery that will make you see your cat in a new light.

Highlights:
Talking cats with unique personalities: from wise guardians to mischievous felines with magical powers.

A secret world right under our noses: lost cities, enchanted rooftops, and magical tunnels.

A curious and brave heroine: Lucy is the only human capable of understanding cats... and perhaps the only one who can help them.

Mysteries to be solved: ancient riddles, prophecies, and an ancient bond in danger.

A journey filled with emotions: friendship, courage, laughter... and lots of mustaches.
